news.title: Thoma Bravo Acquires Dayforce Inc. for $12.3 Billion
news.description: Thoma Bravo agrees to take private human capital management software company Dayforce Inc. in one of the largest PE deals of 2025.

news.title: Nordic Capital Acquires Arcadia Healthcare Software Company
news.description: Nordic Capital completes acquisition of Arcadia, a US-based healthcare software company, strengthening its healthcare technology portfolio.

news.title: Carlyle Group Offers $23.86 Billion for Santos Ltd.
news.description: An investor group including The Carlyle Group Inc. offers to buy oil and natural gas company Santos Ltd. in one of the largest energy sector deals.

news.title: Blackstone Infrastructure Acquires TXNM Energy for $11.5 Billion
news.description: Blackstone Infrastructure completes buyout of TXNM Energy, marking one of the largest energy sector deals in the US during Q2 2025.

news.title: EQT Acquires Crown Castle's Small Cells Business for $4.25 Billion
news.description: EQT announces acquisition of Crown Castle's small cells business for $4.25 billion, expanding its telecommunications infrastructure portfolio.

news.title: Sycamore Partners Acquires Walgreens in Major Retail Deal
news.description: Sycamore Partners completes substantial acquisition of Walgreens, contributing to a 45% year-over-year surge in private equity deal volume in Q1 2025.

news.title: EQT Life Sciences Co-Leads USD 183 Million Series C Financing
news.description: EQT Life Sciences announces co-leading a USD 183 million Series C financing round for a portfolio company, supporting continued growth and expansion.

news.title: Nordic Capital-backed NOBA Lists Successfully on Nasdaq Stockholm
news.description: NOBA, backed by Nordic Capital, successfully lists on Nasdaq Stockholm following strong investor demand and successful IPO process.

news.title: Adelis Equity Partners Announces New Investment in Circura
news.description: Adelis Equity Partners forms Circura, a leading group in property renovation and service, targeting SEK 2 billion in revenue by 2025.

news.title: Summa Equity Completes Full Exit of Infobric
news.description: Summa Equity announces successful exit from Infobric, a leading provider of construction technology solutions, following strong growth under their ownership.

news.title: Ratos Company HENT Wins NOK 2.4 Billion Infrastructure Contract
news.description: HENT, a company within the Ratos group, has been awarded a contract worth NOK 2.4 billion to build a new passenger terminal at Bod√∏ airport in Norway.

description: Comprehensive Nordic and global PE news with most recent deals first
source: Cision RSS feeds, S&P Global, KPMG, and firm press releases
